name: 1BIT DANMAKU
description:
This is BULLET HELL GAME.

Keep avoiding enemy bullets. But the enemy gets strong over time. It is also important to hit your bullet against the enemy and knock it down quickly.

I started making games on May 1 in 2019.
This is my second game.
The development period is one week.

We were developing it in 1-bit color ,but it's no longer 1-bit color. The title is "1 BIT DANMAKU" because of its legacy.
